Room.Name: Orchard Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a short path between the winery general store and farm housing.
Room.LongDescription: The path meanders in an east-west direction, following a drainage ditch filled with sewage. The grape vines along the sewage ditch appear to be particularily healthy and productive. To the west is a number of small shacks, lovingly called homes by the grape pickers who live there.
